events.name: Synergia’25 National Innovation Fest
events.description: National-level innovation festival with hackathon, aero-tech fest, robotics competitions and science talent hunt.
segments: 8th Devhost – 36-hour national-level hackathon (by Sahyadri Open Source Community)
Robotics competitions by Sahyadri Robotics Club (robo soccer, sumo battles, autonomous navigation)
events.target_participants: Students from Grade 8 to engineering level

events.name: COSMIC – 2025 (Second IEEE International Conference on Computing, Semiconductor, Mechatronics, Intelligent Systems and Communications)
events.description: International conference for researchers, engineers and students in computing, semiconductor, mechatronics, intelligent systems and communications. Includes keynote sessions, paper/poster presentations.

events.name: Sahyadri Carnival 2025
events.description: Flagship student-centric carnival by the Department of Business Administration featuring a job fair, management and cultural events.

events.name: Faculty Development Program on Innovation & Entrepreneurship
events.description: 5-day FDP (non-residential) aimed at faculty and incubation managers to build skills in innovation management, startup ecosystem, IP rights, and product development.

events.name: 15th Graduation Day Ceremony — First Autonomous Batch (Engineering, 2025)
events.description: Graduation day for first autonomous batch of BE students passed out in 2025. Awards and gold medals presented to top achievers.
